Header: Runners-Up Slot in DSG Water Polo Goes to Army Players
Content: Army men and women, competing in the Defence Services  Games (DSG)  Water Polo finals on Friday (13) secured the runners-up slot after bagging 7 Gold medals (men’s - 5, women’s - 2) at Ratmalana Sri Lanka Air Force Swimming Pool Complex. Sri Lanka Air Force men’s and women’s teams emerged champions after a close tussle against Army players.
